on reading compounds: 困惑【コンワク】bewilderment, perplexity, embarrassment, discomfiture, bafflement
困難【コンナン】difficulty, hardship, trouble, distress, infeasibility, inability (to carry out)
絶対貧困【ゼッタイヒンコン】absolute poverty
絶対的貧困【ゼッタイテキヒンコン】absolute poverty
kun reading compounds: 困る【こまる】to be troubled, to have difficulty, to be in a fix, to be at a loss, to be stumped, to be embarrassed, to be bothered, to be inconvenienced, to be annoyed, to be badly off, to be hard up, to be in straitened circumstances
